title: Does reporting a leaver makes our reports less valuable?
body:
Hey,
I got a little problem and i would apperciate a reply from someone that knows the system.
So, some time ago i heard that reports can get less valuable if you use them  too much.
If then can my reports become less important if i report a confirmed leaver ( i mean that system catched that and in post-game statistics his portrait is crossed out)?

replies.body: Your reports will always carry the same weight. It wouldn't make much sense for us to devalue certain people's reports since that would only make it harder for us to catch the truthful reports.
